meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sudden or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: The suddennesses of the thunderstorm startled everyone.
meanings.sent2: The suddennesses of the alarm caught us off guard.
meanings.sent3: The suddennesses of the surprise party made us all jump with joy.
meanings.sent4: The suddennesses of the news hit us like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The suddennesses of the car honk made us all jump in surprise.

meanings.definition: The fact or condition of happening unexpectedly or abruptly.
meanings.sent1: The suddennesses of the power outage left us in darkness.
meanings.sent2: The suddennesses of the decision left us speechless.
meanings.sent3: The suddennesses of the cake falling off the table was comical.
meanings.sent4: The suddennesses of the final exam felt like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The suddennesses of the applause filled the room with surprise.
